tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  disease VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    treatment_date DATE,
    duration_hours INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientDemographics (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PatientHealthRecords (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  doctor_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientDemographics(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  appointment_date DATE,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_type VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  test_date DATE,
  test_type VARCHAR(100),
  test_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    diagnosis VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    condition VARCHAR,
    treatment VARCHAR,
    physician VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE VitalSigns (
    vital_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
    record_date DATE,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE LabResults (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
    test_date DATE,
    test_name VARCHAR,
    value Numeric,
    unit VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlan (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    treatment_details VARCHAR
);
